title: Social-Media-Student-Mental-Health
description: Built multiple linear regression models using Ordinary Least Squares (OLS) to assess the impact of social media usage and other predictors on loneliness, anxiety, and depression among college students.

title: San-Diego-MTS
description: Analyzed real-world transit data using Python (Pandas, Matplotlib) to identify inefficiencies in San Diego's bus network.

title: Job Layoff Analysis
description: This project analyzes recent workforce layoffs across companies and industries, identifying key trends and patterns in employment reductions.

title: Modeling-Comebacks-in-LoL
description: Predicting comebacks in League of Legends esports using machine learning. When teams are losing at 20 minutes, what factors determine if they can still win? This analysis reveals the hidden patterns behind unlikely victories.

title: Bikewatching
description: An immersive, interactive map visualization of bike traffic in the Boston area during different times of the day. Features over 260,000 trip records with time-based filtering and traffic flow visualization.

title: Data Merging Automation Script
description: Automated the process of merging land temperature datasets with truth data using Pandas and coordinate normalization.

title: Climate Change Visualization Dashboard
description: Built a visualization dashboard to explore global temperature trends and anomalies using Plotly and D3.js.

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: Created a collaborative filtering recommendation system using cosine similarity and user rating data.

title: Abortion Clinic Availability Map
description: Visualized U.S. clinic accessibility using choropleth maps to highlight reproductive health disparities.

title: Bayesian Network Reasoning Tool
description: Implemented probabilistic inference algorithms including variable elimination and sampling in a Bayesian network.

title: ER Diagram to SQL Translator
description: Converted entity-relationship diagrams into normalized SQL schemas using Python-based rule translation.

title: Study Guide Generator
description: Developed an automated study guide generator for course concepts using Markdown and Python templating.
